message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 20% of the total. It's a generous offer, don't you think?
I think you can do better than that, Alice. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more for my generosity. Take it or leave it!
You're not budging, huh? I'll try to squeeze out a bit more. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still willing to compromise.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not impressed with your 'final offer'. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to back down completely. This is my revised offer, take it or leave it!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about negotiating, Bob. I'll give you the same offer I made in Round 1, but I'm not going to make it any sweeter than that. Take it or leave it!
